word.greekot: ἦ οὐκ ἐπ' αὐτῷ ἐπεποίθειν βοήθεια δὲ ἀπ' ἐμοῦ ἄπεστιν

word.kjv: And that he would shew thee the secrets of wisdom, that they are double to that which is! Know therefore that God exacteth of thee less than thine iniquity deserveth.
word.thailand: ใคร่จะให้พระองค์ทรงสำแดงเคล็ดลับของสติปัญญาให้ท่าน เพราะความเข้าใจของพระองค์อเนกอนันต์ จงทราบเถิดว่าพระเจ้าทรงเรียกร้องจากท่านน้อยกว่าความชั่วช้าของท่านพึงได้รับ
word.spanish1909: Y que te declarara los arcanos de la sabiduría, Que son de doble valor que la hacienda! Conocerías entonces que Dios te ha castigado menos que tu iniquidad merece.
word.latinvulgate: ut ostenderet tibi secreta sapientiæ, et quod multiplex esset lex ejus, et intelligeres quod multo minora exigaris ab eo quam meretur iniquitas tua !
word.italian1927: e rivelarti i segreti della sua sapienza poiché infinita è la sua intelligenza vedresti allora come Iddio dimentichi parte della colpa tua.
word.german1912: und zeigte dir die heimliche Weisheit! Denn er hätte noch wohl mehr an dir zu tun, auf daß du wissest, daß er deiner Sünden nicht aller gedenkt.
word.french1910: Et s'il te révélait les secrets de sa sagesse, De son immense sagesse, Tu verrais alors qu'il ne te traite pas selon ton iniquité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 把智慧的奧祕向你顯明，因為真的智慧有兩面。你當知道　神已忘記了你一部分的罪孽。
word.korean: 지혜의 오묘로 네게 보이시기를 원하노니 이는 그의 지식이 광대 하심이라 너는 알라 하나님의 벌하심이 네 죄보다 경하니라
word.tagalog: At ipakilala nawa sa iyo ang mga lihim ng karunungan, pagka't siya ay masagana sa pagkaunawa. Talastasin mo nga na nilalapatan ka ng Dios ng kulang kay sa nauukol sa iyong kasamaan.
word.maori: Me i whakaaturia mai e ia ki a koe nga mea ngaro o te matauranga, te huhua o nga ara o tana mahi! Na kia matau koe, he iti iho i ou he ta te Atua e tango nei i a koe.
word.cebuano: Ug nga tudloan ka niya sa mga tinago sa kaalam! Kay kaniya sa pagkamasinabuton walay makatupong. Busa hibaloi nga ang Dios nagapaningil sa labing diyutay kay sa silot nga angay sa imong kasal-anan.
word.hebrew: ו  ויגד-לך תעלמות חכמה--    כי-כפלים לתושיה ודע--    כי-ישה לך אלוה מעונך
word.hebrewmodern: ויגד לך תעלמות חכמה כי כפלים לתושיה ודע כי ישה לך אלוה מעונך׃
word.greekot: εἶτα ἀναγγελεῖ σοι δύναμιν σοφίας ὅτι διπλοῦς ἔσται τῶν κατὰ σέ καὶ τότε γνώσῃ ὅτι ἄξιά σοι ἀπέβη ἀπὸ κυρίου ὧν ἡμάρτηκας

word.kjv: No doubt but ye are the people, and wisdom shall die with you.
word.thailand: "ไม่ต้องสงสัยเลยที่ท่านทั้งหลายเป็นเสียงของประชาชน และสติปัญญาจะตายไปพร้อมกับท่าน
word.spanish1909: Ciertamente que vosotros sois el pueblo; Y con vosotros morirá la sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Ergo vos estis soli homines, et vobiscum morietur sapientia ?
word.italian1927: "Voi, certo, valete quanto un popolo, e con voi morrà la sapienza.
word.german1912: Ja, ihr seid die Leute, mit euch wird die Weisheit sterben!
word.french1910: On dirait, en vérité, que le genre humain c'est vous, Et qu'avec vous doit mourir la sagesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: “你們真的是有知識的民，你們死了，智慧也跟你們一同滅亡。
word.korean: 너희만 참으로 사람이로구나 너희가 죽으면 지혜도 죽겠구나
word.tagalog: Walang pagaalinlangan na kayo ang bayan, At ang karunungan ay mamamatay na kasama ninyo.
word.maori: He tika rawa ko koutou nga tangata, a ka mate tahi atu te whakaaro nui me koutou.
word.cebuano: Sa walay duhaduha kamo mao ang katawohan, Ug ang kaalam mamatay uban kaninyo.
word.hebrew: ב  אמנם כי אתם-עם    ועמכם תמות חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: אמנם כי אתם עם ועמכם תמות חכמה׃
word.greekot: εἶτα ὑμεῖς ἐστε ἄνθρωποι ἦ μεθ' ὑμῶν τελευτήσει σοφία

word.kjv: With the ancient is wisdom; and in length of days understanding.
word.thailand: สติปัญญาอยู่กับคนมีอายุมาก และอายุยืนยาวทำให้เกิดความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: En los viejos está la ciencia, Y en la larga edad la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: In antiquis est sapientia, et in multo tempore prudentia.
word.italian1927: Nei vecchi si trova la sapienza e lunghezza di giorni da intelligenza.
word.german1912: Ja, "bei den Großvätern ist die Weisheit, und der Verstand bei den Alten".
word.french1910: Dans les vieillards se trouve la sagesse, Et dans une longue vie l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們說：老年的有智慧，長壽的有聰明。
word.korean: 늙은 자에게는 지혜가 있고 장수하는 자에게는 명철이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Nasa mga matanda ang karunungan, at sa kagulangan ang unawa.
word.maori: ¶ Kei nga kaumatua nga whakaaro nui; kei te roa o nga ra te matau.
word.cebuano: Ang kaalam anaa sa mga tawong tigulang, Ug ang kataas sa mga adlaw anaa sa maayong pagsabut.
word.hebrew: יב  בישישים חכמה    וארך ימים תבונה
word.hebrewmodern: בישישים חכמה וארך ימים תבונה׃
word.greekot: ἐν πολλῷ χρόνῳ σοφία ἐν δὲ πολλῷ βίῳ ἐπιστήμη

word.kjv: With him is wisdom and strength, he hath counsel and understanding.
word.thailand: สติปัญญาและฤทธานุภาพอยู่กับพระเจ้า พระองค์ทรงมีคำแนะนำและความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Con Dios está la sabiduría y la fortaleza; Suyo es el consejo y la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Apud ipsum est sapientia et fortitudo ; ipse habet consilium et intelligentiam.
word.italian1927: Ma in Dio stanno la saviezza e la potenza, a lui appartengono il consiglio e l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Bei ihm ist Weisheit und Gewalt, Rat und Verstand.
word.french1910: En Dieu résident la sagesse et la puissance. Le conseil et l'intelligence lui appartiennent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 陳述　神的智慧與能力他有智慧與能力，又有謀略與聰明。
word.korean: 지혜와 권능이 하나님께 있고 모략과 명철도 그에게 속하였나니
word.tagalog: Nasa Dios ang karunungan at kakayahan; kaniya ang payo at pagkaunawa.
word.maori: Kei a ia te whakaaro nui me te kaha; kei a ia te tohutohu me te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Sa Dios anaa ang kaalam ug ang kagahum; Ang tambag ug ang pagsabut anaa kaniya.
word.hebrew: יג  עמו חכמה וגבורה    לו עצה ותבונה
word.hebrewmodern: עמו חכמה וגבורה לו עצה ותבונה׃
word.greekot: παρ' αὐτῷ σοφία καὶ δύναμις αὐτῷ βουλὴ καὶ σύνεσις

word.kjv: With him is strength and wisdom: the deceived and the deceiver are his.
word.thailand: พระกำลังและพระสติปัญญาอยู่กับพระองค์ ผู้ถูกลวงทั้งผู้ลวงเป็นของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Con él está la fortaleza y la existencia; Suyo es el que yerra, y el que hace errar.
word.latinvulgate: Apud ipsum est fortitudo et sapientia ; ipse novit et decipientem, et eum qui decipitur.
word.italian1927: Egli possiede la forza e l’abilità; da lui dipendono chi erra e chi fa errare.
word.german1912: Er ist stark und führt es aus. Sein ist, der da irrt und der da verführt.
word.french1910: Il possède la force et la prudence; Il maîtrise celui qui s'égare ou fait égarer les autres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他有大能與智謀，受騙的與騙人的，都是屬他的。
word.korean: 능력과 지혜가 그에게 있고 속은 자와 속이는 자가 다 그에게 속하였으므로
word.tagalog: Nasa kaniya ang kalakasan at ang karunungan, ang nadadaya at ang magdaraya ay kaniya.
word.maori: Kei a ia te kaha me te mahi totika; ko te tangata tinihanga me te tangata e tinihangatia ana, nana.
word.cebuano: Kaniya anaa ang kusog ug kaalam; Iya man ang malimbongon ug ang linimbongan.
word.hebrew: טז  עמו עז ותושיה    לו שגג ומשגה
word.hebrewmodern: עמו עז ותושיה לו שגג ומשגה׃
word.greekot: παρ' αὐτῷ κράτος καὶ ἰσχύς αὐτῷ ἐπιστήμη καὶ σύνεσις

word.kjv: O that ye would altogether hold your peace! and it should be your wisdom.
word.thailand: โอ ท่านน่าจะนิ่งเสีย และความนิ่งนั้นจะเป็นสติปัญญาของท่าน
word.spanish1909: Ojalá callarais del todo, Porque os fuera sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Atque utinam taceretis, ut putaremini esse sapientes !
word.italian1927: Oh se serbaste il silenzio! esso vi conterebbe come sapienza.
word.german1912: Wollte Gott, ihr schwieget, so wäret ihr weise.
word.french1910: Que n'avez-vous gardé le silence? Vous auriez passé pour avoir de la sagesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但願你們完全不作聲，這樣才算為你們的智慧。
word.korean: 너희가 잠잠하고 잠잠하기를 원하노라 이것이 너희의 지혜일 것이니라
word.tagalog: Mano nawa ay magsitahimik kayong lahat! At magiging inyong karunungan.
word.maori: Te pai na, me i mutu rawa a koutou korero! Ko to koutou whakaaro nui hoki tena.
word.cebuano: Oh maayo pa unta kong kamo managhilum na lamang! Ug kana mahimo nga inyong kaalam.
word.hebrew: ה  מי-יתן החרש תחרישון    ותהי לכם לחכמה
word.hebrewmodern: מי יתן החרש תחרישון ותהי לכם לחכמה׃
word.greekot: εἴη δὲ ὑμῖν κωφεῦσαι καὶ ἀποβήσεται ὑμῖν εἰς σοφίαν

word.kjv: Hast thou heard the secret of God? and dost thou restrain wisdom to thyself?
word.thailand: ท่านได้ฟังความลึกลับของพระเจ้าหรือ และท่านจำกัดสติปัญญาไว้เฉพาะตัวท่านหรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿Oíste tú el secreto de Dios, Que detienes en ti solo la sabiduría?
word.latinvulgate: numquid consilium Dei audisti, et inferior te erit ejus sapientia ?
word.italian1927: Hai tu sentito quel che s’è detto nel Consiglio di Dio? Hai tu fatto incetta della sapienza per te solo?
word.german1912: Hast du Gottes heimlichen Rat gehört und die Weisheit an dich gerissen?
word.french1910: As-tu reçu les confidences de Dieu? As-tu dérobé la sagesse à ton profit?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你曾聆聽過　神的密旨嗎？你可以獨佔智慧嗎？
word.korean: 하나님의 모의를 네가 들었느냐 ? 지혜를 홀로 가졌느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Iyo bang narinig ang lihim na payo ng Dios? At ikaw ba'y nagpigil ng karunungan sa iyong sarili?
word.maori: Kua rongo ranei koe i to te Atua whakaaro puku? Kei te kaiponu ranei koe i te whakaaro ki a koe anake?
word.cebuano: Nakadungog ka ba sa tinago nga kaalam sa Dios? Sa imong kaugalingon ba lamang gituga ang kaalam?
word.hebrew: ח  הבסוד אלוה תשמע    ותגרע אליך חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: הבסוד אלוה תשמע ותגרע אליך חכמה׃
word.greekot: ἦ σύνταγμα κυρίου ἀκήκοας εἰς δὲ σὲ ἀφίκετο σοφία

word.kjv: How hast thou counselled him that hath no wisdom? and how hast thou plentifully declared the thing as it is?
word.thailand: ท่านให้คำปรึกษาแก่คนที่ไม่มีสติปัญญา และได้ให้ความรู้มากที่สัมฤทธิ์ผล จริงหนอ
word.spanish1909: ¿En qué aconsejaste al que no tiene ciencia, Y mostraste bien sabiduría?
word.latinvulgate: Cui dedisti consilium ? forsitan illi qui non habet sapientiam, et prudentiam tuam ostendisti plurimam.
word.italian1927: Come hai ben consigliato chi è privo di sapienza! E che abbondanza di sapere tu gli hai comunicato!
word.german1912: Wie gibst du Rat dem, der keine Weisheit hat, und tust kund Verstandes die Fülle!
word.french1910: Quels bons conseils tu donnes à celui qui manque d'intelligence! Quelle abondance de sagesse tu fais paraître!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 無智慧的，你怎樣教導他，顯明你豐盛的智慧！
word.korean: 지혜 없는 자를 참 잘 가르쳤구나 큰 지식을 참 잘 나타내었구나
word.tagalog: Paano mong pinayuhan siya na walang karunungan, at saganang ipinahayag mo ang mabuting kaalaman!
word.maori: Ka tae tau whakatakoto whakaaro ma te whakaarokore! Te nui o tau whakaatu tikanga!
word.cebuano: Giunsa nimo pagtambag siya nga walay kaalam, Ug giunsa nimo pagpahayag sa makadaghan ang maayong kaalam!
word.hebrew: ג  מה-יעצת ללא חכמה    ותשיה לרב הודעת
word.hebrewmodern: מה יעצת ללא חכמה ותושיה לרב הודעת׃
word.greekot: τίνι συμβεβούλευσαι οὐχ ᾧ πᾶσα σοφία ἢ τίνι ἐπακολουθήσεις οὐχ ᾧ μεγίστη δύναμις

word.kjv: But where shall wisdom be found? and where is the place of understanding?
word.thailand: แต่จะพบพระปัญญาที่ไหน และที่ของความเข้าใจอยู่ที่ไหน
word.spanish1909: Empero ¿dónde se hallará la sabiduría? ¿Y dónde está el lugar de la prudencia?
word.latinvulgate: Sapientia vero ubi invenitur ? et quis est locus intelligentiæ ?
word.italian1927: Ma la Sapienza, dove trovarla? E dov’è il luogo della Intelligenza?
word.german1912: Wo will man aber die Weisheit finden? und wo ist die Stätte des Verstandes?
word.french1910: Mais la sagesse, où se trouve-t-elle? Où est la demeure de l'intelligence?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而，智慧在何處可尋？聰明之地在哪裡呢？
word.korean: 그러나 지혜는 어디서 얻으며 명철의 곳은 어디인고
word.tagalog: Nguni't saan masusumpungan ang karunungan? At saan naroon ang dako ng pagkaunawa?
word.maori: E kitea ia ki hea te whakaaro nui? kei hea hoki te wahi o te mohio?
word.cebuano: Apan asa ba ang kaalam igkita? Ug hain ba ang pinuy-anan sa salabutan?
word.hebrew: יב  והחכמה מאין תמצא    ואי זה מקום בינה
word.hebrewmodern: והחכמה מאין תמצא ואי זה מקום בינה׃
word.greekot: ἡ δὲ σοφία πόθεν εὑρέθη ποῖος δὲ τόπος ἐστὶν τῆς ἐπιστήμης

word.kjv: No mention shall be made of coral, or of pearls: for the price of wisdom is above rubies.
word.thailand: อย่าเอ่ยถึงหินปะการังและไข่มุกเลย ค่าของพระปัญญาสูงกว่ามุกดา
word.spanish1909: De coral ni de perlas no se hará mención: La sabiduría es mejor que piedras preciosas.
word.latinvulgate: Excelsa et eminentia non memorabuntur comparatione ejus : trahitur autem sapientia de occultis.
word.italian1927: Non si parli di corallo, di cristallo; la Sapienza val più delle perle.
word.german1912: Korallen und Kristall achtet man gegen sie nicht. Die Weisheit ist höher zu wägen denn Perlen.
word.french1910: Le corail et le cristal ne sont rien auprès d'elle: La sagesse vaut plus que les perles.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 珊瑚和水晶都不值一提，取得智慧勝過取得紅寶石。
word.korean: 산호나 수정으로도 말할 수 없나니 지혜의 값은 홍보석보다 귀하구나
word.tagalog: Hindi mabibilang ang coral o ang cristal; Oo, ang halaga ng karunungan ay higit sa mga rubi.
word.maori: E kore e whakahuatia te kaoa, nga peara ranei; hira ake hoki te utu o te whakaaro nui i to te rupi.
word.cebuano: Ang guso ug ang salamin dili pagahisgutan: Oo, ang bili sa kaalam labaw pa kay sa mga mutya.
word.hebrew: יח  ראמות וגביש לא יזכר    ומשך חכמה מפנינים
word.hebrewmodern: ראמות וגביש לא יזכר ומשך חכמה מפנינים׃
word.greekot: μετέωρα καὶ γαβις οὐ μνησθήσεται καὶ ἕλκυσον σοφίαν ὑπὲρ τὰ ἐσώτατα

word.kjv: Whence then cometh wisdom? and where is the place of understanding?
word.thailand: ดังนั้นพระปัญญามาจากไหนเล่า และที่ของความเข้าใจอยู่ที่ไหน
word.spanish1909: ¿De dónde pues vendrá la sabiduría? ¿Y dónde está el lugar de la inteligencia?
word.latinvulgate: Unde ergo sapientia venit ? et quis est locus intelligentiæ ?
word.italian1927: Donde vien dunque la Sapienza? E dov’è il luogo della Intelligenza?
word.german1912: Woher kommt denn die Weisheit? und wo ist die Stätte des Verstandes?
word.french1910: D'où vient donc la sagesse? Où est la demeure de l'intelligence?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 然而，智慧從哪裡來，聰明之地在哪裡呢？
word.korean: 그런즉 지혜는 어디서 오며 명철의 곳은 어디인고
word.tagalog: Saan nanggagaling nga ang karunungan? At saan naroon ang dako ng pagkaunawa?
word.maori: ¶ Ka haere mai ra i hea te whakaaro nui? Kei hea te wahi o te matau?
word.cebuano: Diin man diay magagikan ang kaalam? Ug hain man ang dapit sa salabutan?
word.hebrew: כ  והחכמה מאין תבוא    ואי זה מקום בינה
word.hebrewmodern: והחכמה מאין תבוא ואי זה מקום בינה׃
word.greekot: ἡ δὲ σοφία πόθεν εὑρέθη ποῖος δὲ τόπος ἐστὶν τῆς συνέσεως

word.kjv: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.
word.thailand: และพระองค์ตรัสกับมนุษย์ว่า `ดูเถิด ความยำเกรงองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า นั่นแหละคือพระปัญญา และที่จะหันจากความชั่ว คือความเข้าใจ'"
word.spanish1909: Y dijo al hombre: He aquí que el temor del Señor es la sabiduría, Y el apartarse del mal la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Et dixit homini : Ecce timor Domini, ipsa est sapientia, et recedere a malo, intelligentia.
word.italian1927: E disse all’uomo: "Ecco: temere il Signore: questa è la Sapienza, e fuggire il male è l’Intelligenza"."
word.german1912: und sprach zu den Menschen: Siehe, die Furcht des HERRN, das ist Weisheit; und meiden das Böse, das ist Verstand.
word.french1910: Puis il dit à l'homme: Voici, la crainte du Seigneur, c'est la sagesse; S'éloigner du mal, c'est l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他對人說：‘敬畏主就是智慧，遠離邪惡就是聰明。’”
word.korean: 또 사람에게 이르시기를 주를 경외함이 곧 지혜요, 악을 떠남이 명철이라 ! 하셨느니라
word.tagalog: At sa tao ay sinabi niya, Narito, ang pagkatakot sa Dios ay siyang karunungan; at ang paghiwalay sa kasamaan ay pagkaunawa.
word.maori: A ka mea ia ki te tangata, Na, ko te wehi ki te Ariki, ko te whakaaro nui tena; a ko te mawehe atu i te kino, koia te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ug miingon siya sa tawo: Ania karon, ang kahadlok sa Ginoo, nga mao ang kaalam; Ug ang paglikay sa dautan mao ang salabutan.
word.hebrew: כח  ויאמר לאדם--הן יראת אדני היא חכמה    וסור מרע בינה
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר לאדם הן יראת אדני היא חכמה וסור מרע בינה׃
word.greekot: εἶπεν δὲ ἀνθρώπῳ ἰδοὺ ἡ θεοσέβειά ἐστιν σοφία τὸ δὲ ἀπέχεσθαι ἀπὸ κακῶν ἐστιν ἐπιστήμη

word.kjv: I said, Days should speak, and multitude of years should teach wisdom.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าว่า `ขอให้วัยพูดเถิด และให้ปีหลายปีสอนสติปัญญา'
word.spanish1909: Yo decía: Los días hablarán, Y la muchedumbre de años declarará sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Sperabam enim quod ætas prolixior loqueretur, et annorum multitudo doceret sapientiam.
word.italian1927: Dicevo: "Parleranno i giorni, e il gran numero degli anni insegnerà la sapienza".
word.german1912: Ich dachte: Laß das Alter reden, und die Menge der Jahre laß Weisheit beweisen.
word.french1910: Je disais en moi-même: Les jours parleront, Le grand nombre des années enseignera la sagesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我心裡想：‘年長的當先說話，壽高的當以智慧教訓人。’
word.korean: 내가 말하기를 날이 많은 자가 말을 낼 것이요 해가 오랜 자가 지혜를 가르칠 것이라 하였으나
word.tagalog: Aking sinabi, Ang mga kaarawan ang mangagsasalita, at ang karamihan ng mga taon ay mangagtuturo ng karunungan.
word.maori: I mea ahau, Ma nga ra te korero, ma nga tau kua maha e whakaatu te whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Ako miingon: Ang mga adlaw maoy mosaysay, Ug ang gidaghanon sa mga tubig motudlo sa kaalam.
word.hebrew: ז  אמרתי ימים ידברו    ורב שנים ידיעו חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: אמרתי ימים ידברו ורב שנים ידיעו חכמה׃
word.greekot: εἶπα δὲ ὅτι ὁ χρόνος ἐστὶν ὁ λαλῶν ἐν πολλοῖς δὲ ἔτεσιν οἴδασιν σοφίαν

word.kjv: Lest ye should say, We have found out wisdom: God thrusteth him down, not man.
word.thailand: อย่าเพ่อพูดนะว่า `เราได้พบพระปัญญาแล้ว พระเจ้าทรงผลักเขาลงแล้ว มิใช่มนุษย์'
word.spanish1909: Porque no digáis: Nosotros hemos hallado sabiduría: Lanzólo Dios, no el hombre.
word.latinvulgate: Ne forte dicatis : Invenimus sapientiam : Deus projecit eum, non homo.
word.italian1927: Non avete dunque ragione di dire: "Abbiam trovato la sapienza! Dio soltanto lo farà cedere; non l’uomo!"
word.german1912: Sagt nur nicht: "Wir haben Weisheit getroffen; Gott muß ihn schlagen, kein Mensch."
word.french1910: Ne dites pas cependant: En lui nous avons trouvé la sagesse; C'est Dieu qui peut le confondre, ce n'est pas un homme!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們不要說：‘我們尋得了智慧；能勝過他的，是　神，不是人。’
word.korean: 당신들이 혹시라도 말하기를 우리가 지혜를 깨달았었구나 그를 이길 자는 하나님이시요 사람이 아니라 하지 말지니라
word.tagalog: Magbawa nga kayo, baka kayo'y magsabi, Kami ay nakasumpong ng karunungan; madadaig ng Dios siya, hindi ng tao;
word.maori: Kei mea koutou, Kua kitea e matou te mohio, na te Atua ia i turaki, ehara i te tangata.
word.cebuano: Bantayi ninyo aron kamo dili magaingon: Nakaplagan namo ang kaalam; Ang Dios mao ang makakaplag kaniya, dili ang tawo:
word.hebrew: יג  פן-תאמרו מצאנו חכמה    אל ידפנו לא-איש
word.hebrewmodern: פן תאמרו מצאנו חכמה אל ידפנו לא איש׃
word.greekot: ἵνα μὴ εἴπητε εὕρομεν σοφίαν κυρίῳ προσθέμενοι

word.kjv: If not, hearken unto me: hold thy peace, and I shall teach thee wisdom.
word.thailand: ถ้าหาไม่ก็ขอฟังข้าพเจ้า ขอเงียบและข้าพเจ้าจะสอนปัญญาให้แก่ท่าน"
word.spanish1909: Y si no, óyeme tú á mí; Calla, y enseñarte he sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Quod si non habes, audi me : tace, et docebo te sapientiam.
word.italian1927: Se no, tu dammi ascolto, taci, e t’insegnerò la saviezza".
word.german1912: Hast du aber nichts, so höre mir zu und schweige; ich will dich die Weisheit lehren.
word.french1910: Si tu n'as rien à dire, écoute-moi! Tais-toi, et je t'enseignerai la sagesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你若沒有話說，就要聽我說，你當默不作聲，我就把智慧教導你。”
word.korean: 만일 없으면 내 말을 들으라 잠잠하라 내가 지혜로 너를 가르치리라
word.tagalog: Kung hindi, dinggin mo ako: tumahimik ka, at tuturuan kita ng karunungan.
word.maori: Ki te kahore, whakarongo ki ahau: noho puku koe, a maku koe e whakaako ki te whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Kong dili, magpatalinghug ka kanako: Humilum ka, ug tudloan ko ikaw sa kaalam.
word.hebrew: לג  אם-אין אתה שמע-לי    החרש ואאלפך חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: אם אין אתה שמע לי החרש ואאלפך חכמה׃
word.greekot: εἰ μή σὺ ἄκουσόν μου κώφευσον καὶ διδάξω σε σοφίαν

word.kjv: Job hath spoken without knowledge, and his words were without wisdom.
word.thailand: โยบพูดอย่างไม่มีความรู้ ถ้อยคำของเขาปราศจากสติปัญญา
word.spanish1909: Que Job no habla con sabiduría, Y que sus palabras no son con entendimiento.
word.latinvulgate: Job autem stulte locutus est, et verba illius non sonant disciplinam.
word.italian1927: "Giobbe parla senza giudizio, le sue parole sono senza intendimento".
word.german1912: "Hiob redet mit Unverstand, und seine Worte sind nicht klug."
word.french1910: Job parle sans intelligence, Et ses discours manquent de raison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 約伯說話毫無知識，他的言語沒有智慧。
word.korean: 욥이 무식하게 말하니 그 말이 지혜 없다 하리라
word.tagalog: Si Job ay nagsasalita ng walang kaalaman. At ang kaniyang mga salita ay walang karunungan.
word.maori: Kahore he matauranga o Hopa i a ia i korero ra, kahore hoki he mahara i roto i ana kupu.
word.cebuano: Si Job mosulti sa walay hibangkaagan, Ug ang iyang mga pulong walay kaalam.
word.hebrew: לה  איוב לא-בדעת ידבר    ודבריו לא בהשכיל
word.hebrewmodern: איוב לא בדעת ידבר ודבריו לא בהשכיל׃
word.greekot: ιωβ δὲ οὐκ ἐν συνέσει ἐλάλησεν τὰ δὲ ῥήματα αὐτοῦ οὐκ ἐν ἐπιστήμῃ

word.kjv: Behold, God is mighty, and despiseth not any: he is mighty in strength and wisdom.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเจ้าทรงอานุภาพ และมิได้ทรงเหยียดหยามผู้ใดเลย พระองค์ทรงอานุภาพในเรื่องกำลังและสติปัญญา
word.spanish1909: He aquí que Dios es grande, mas no desestima á nadie; Es poderoso en fuerza de sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Deus potentes non abjicit, cum et ipse sit potens :
word.italian1927: Ecco, Iddio è potente, ma non disdegna nessuno; è potente per la forza dell’intelletto suo.
word.german1912: Siehe, Gott ist mächtig, und verachtet doch niemand; er ist mächtig von Kraft des Herzens.
word.french1910: Dieu est puissant, mais il ne rejette personne; Il est puissant par la force de son intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神大有能力，並且不藐視人，他的智慧大有能力。
word.korean: 하나님이 기이하게 음성을 울리시며 우리의 헤아릴 수 없는 큰 일을 행하시느니라
word.tagalog: Narito ang Dios ay makapangyarihan, at hindi humahamak sa kanino man; siya'y makapangyarihan sa lakas ng unawa.
word.maori: ¶ Nana, he pakari te Atua, e kore ano ia e whakahawea: pakari tonu te kaha o tona matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ang Dios makagagahum man, ug walay bisan kinsa nga gitamay niya: Siya makusganon sa kalig-on sa salabutan.
word.hebrew: ה  הן-אל כביר ולא ימאס    כביר כח לב
word.hebrewmodern: הן אל כביר ולא ימאס כביר כח לב׃
word.greekot: γίγνωσκε δὲ ὅτι ὁ κύριος οὐ μὴ ἀποποιήσηται τὸν ἄκακον δυνατὸς ἰσχύι καρδίας

word.kjv: Who hath put wisdom in the inward parts? or who hath given understanding to the heart?
word.thailand: ใครให้สติปัญญาภายใน หรือให้ความเข้าใจแก่จิตใจ
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién puso la sabiduría en el interior? ¿O quién dió al entendimiento la inteligencia?
word.latinvulgate: Quis posuit in visceribus hominis sapientiam ? vel quis dedit gallo intelligentiam ?
word.italian1927: Chi ha messo negli strati delle nubi sapienza, o chi ha dato intelletto alla meteora?
word.german1912: Wer gibt die Weisheit in das Verborgene? Wer gibt verständige Gedanken?
word.french1910: Qui a mis la sagesse dans le coeur, Ou qui a donné l'intelligence à l'esprit?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰把智慧放在懷裡，或把聰明賜於人的心中？
word.tagalog: Sinong naglagay ng karunungan sa mga pinakaloob na bahagi? O sinong nagbigay ng kaalaman sa pagiisip?
word.maori: Na wai i whakanoho nga whakaaro nunui ki nga wahi o roto? Na wai i homai nga mahara ki te ngakau?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang nagbutang ug kaalam sa kinasulorang bahin? Kun kinsa ba ang naghatag ug salabutan sa utok?
word.hebrew: לו  מי-שת בטחות חכמה    או מי-נתן לשכוי בינה
word.hebrewmodern: מי שת בטחות חכמה או מי נתן לשכוי בינה׃
word.greekot: τίς δὲ ἔδωκεν γυναιξὶν ὑφάσματος σοφίαν ἢ ποικιλτικὴν ἐπιστήμην

word.kjv: Who can number the clouds in wisdom? or who can stay the bottles of heaven,
word.thailand: ใครจะนับเมฆด้วยสติปัญญาได้ หรือใครจะเอียงถุงน้ำของท้องฟ้าได้
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién puso por cuenta los cielos con sabiduría? Y los odres de los cielos, ¿quién los hace parar,
word.latinvulgate: Quis enarrabit cælorum rationem, et concentum cæli quis dormire faciet ?
word.italian1927: Chi conta con sapienza le nubi? e gli otri del cielo chi li versa
word.german1912: Wer ist so weise, der die Wolken zählen könnte? Wer kann die Wasserschläuche am Himmel ausschütten,
word.french1910: Qui peut avec sagesse compter les nuages, Et verser les outres des cieux,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 塵土融合成團，土塊黏結在一起的時候，
word.tagalog: Sinong makabibilang ng mga alapaap sa pamamagitan ng karunungan? O sinong makatutuyo ng mga botelya ng langit,
word.maori: Ko wai te mea whakaaro nui hei tatau i nga kapua? Ko wai hei tahoro i nga ipu o te rangi?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang makaihap sa mga panganod pinaagi sa kaalam? Kun kinsa ba ang arang makabubo sa mga botella sa langit,
word.hebrew: לז  מי-יספר שחקים בחכמה    ונבלי שמים מי ישכיב
word.hebrewmodern: מי יספר שחקים בחכמה ונבלי שמים מי ישכיב׃
word.greekot: τίς δὲ ὁ ἀριθμῶν νέφη σοφίᾳ οὐρανὸν δὲ εἰς γῆν ἔκλινεν

word.kjv: Because God hath deprived her of wisdom, neither hath he imparted to her understanding.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเจ้าทรงกระทำให้มันลืมสติปัญญา และมิได้ทรงให้มันมีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: (H39-20) Porque le privó Dios de sabiduría, Y no le dió inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Privavit enim eam Deus sapientia, nec dedit illi intelligentiam.
word.italian1927: ché Iddio l’ha privato di sapienza, e non gli ha impartito intelligenza.
word.german1912: Denn Gott hat ihm die Weisheit genommen und hat ihm keinen Verstand zugeteilt.
word.french1910: Car Dieu lui a refusé la sagesse, Il ne lui a pas donné l'intelligence en partage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為　神使牠忘記了智慧，也沒有把聰明分給牠。
word.korean: 그 꼬리 치는 것은 백향목이 흔들리는 것 같고 그 넓적다리 힘줄은 서로 연락되었으며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't binawian siya ng Dios ng karunungan, ni hindi siya binahaginan ng unawa.
word.maori: No te mea i whakakahoretia e te Atua he ngakau mahara mona, kihai hoki i homai he whakaaro ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Tungod kay gikuhaan siya sa Dios ug kaalam, Ni gihatagan siya ug salabutan.
word.hebrew: יז  כי-השה אלוה חכמה    ולא-חלק לה בבינה
word.hebrewmodern: כי השה אלוה חכמה ולא חלק לה בבינה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι κατεσιώπησεν αὐτῇ ὁ θεὸς σοφίαν καὶ οὐκ ἐμέρισεν αὐτῇ ἐν τῇ συνέσει

word.kjv: Doth the hawk fly by thy wisdom, and stretch her wings toward the south?
word.thailand: เหยี่ยวนกเขาโผไปมาด้วยสติปัญญาของเจ้าหรือ และกางปีกของมันตรงไปทางทิศใต้
word.spanish1909: (H39-29) ¿Vuela el gavilán por tu industria, Y extiende hacia el mediodía sus alas?
word.latinvulgate: Numquid per sapientiam tuam plumescit accipiter, expandens alas suas ad austrum ?
word.italian1927: E’ l’intelligenza tua che allo sparviere fa spiccare il volo e spiegar l’ali verso mezzogiorno?
word.german1912: Fliegt der Habicht durch deinen Verstand und breitet seine Flügel gegen Mittag?
word.french1910: Est-ce par ton intelligence que l'épervier prend son vol, Et qu'il étend ses ailes vers le midi?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 鷹鳥飛翔，展翅南飛，是因著你的聰明嗎？
word.tagalog: Lumilipad ba ang uwak sa pamamagitan ng inyong karunungan, at iniuunat ba ang kaniyang mga pakpak sa dakong timugan?
word.maori: ¶ He mohio nou i rere ai te kahu, i roha ai i ona parirau, i anga ai whaka te tonga?
word.cebuano: Maglupad ba ang banog tungod sa iyang kaalam, Ug magtuy-od sa iyang mga pako padulong sa habagatan?
word.hebrew: כו  המבינתך יאבר-נץ    יפרש כנפו לתימן
word.hebrewmodern: המבינתך יאבר נץ יפרש כנפו לתימן׃
word.greekot: ἐκ δὲ τῆς σῆς ἐπιστήμης ἕστηκεν ἱέραξ ἀναπετάσας τὰς πτέρυγας ἀκίνητος καθορῶν τὰ πρὸς νότον

word.kjv: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.
word.thailand: ปากของคนชอบธรรมเปล่งสติปัญญา และลิ้นของเขาพูดความยุติธรรม
word.spanish1909: La boca del justo hablara sabiduría; Y su lengua proferirá juicio.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La bocca del giusto proferisce sapienza e la sua lingua pronunzia giustizia.
word.german1912: Der Mund des Gerechten redet die Weisheit, und seine Zunge lehrt das Recht.
word.french1910: La bouche du juste annonce la sagesse, Et sa langue proclame la justice.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人的口說出智慧，他的舌頭講論正義。
word.korean: 의인의 입은 지혜를 말하고 그 혀는 공의를 이르며
word.tagalog: Ang bibig ng matuwid ay nangungusap ng karunungan, at ang kaniyang dila ay nagsasalita ng kahatulan.
word.maori: He kupu mohio ta te mangai o te tangata tika; he ritenga pai ta tona arero e korero ai.
word.cebuano: Ang baba sa matarung magasulti ug kaalam, Ug ang iyang dila magalitok ug justicia.
word.hebrew: ל  פי-צדיק יהגה חכמה    ולשונו תדבר משפט
word.hebrewmodern: פי צדיק יהגה חכמה ולשונו תדבר משפט׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: My mouth shall speak of wisdom; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding.
word.thailand: ปากของข้าพเจ้าจะเผยปัญญา การรำพึงของจิตใจข้าพเจ้าคือความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Mi boca hablará sabiduría; Y el pensamiento de mi corazón inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Deus manifeste veniet ; Deus noster, et non silebit. Ignis in conspectu ejus exardescet ; et in circuitu ejus tempestas valida.
word.italian1927: La mia bocca proferirà cose savie, e la meditazione del mio cuore sarà piena di senno.
word.german1912: Mein Mund soll von Weisheit reden und mein Herz von Verstand sagen.
word.french1910: Ma bouche va faire entendre des paroles sages, Et mon coeur a des pensées pleines de sens.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的口要說出智慧的話；我的心要默想明智的事。
word.korean: 내 입은 지혜를 말하겠고 내 마음은 명철을 묵상하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang aking bibig ay magsasalita ng karunungan; at ang pagbubulay ng aking puso ay magiging sa pagunawa.
word.maori: Ka whakapuakina he matauranga e toku mangai: a he ata ngarahu te whakaaro o toku ngakau.
word.cebuano: Ang akong baba magasulti sa kaalam; Ug ang pagpamalandong sa akong kasingkasing mao ang alang sa salabutan.
word.hebrew: ג  גם-בני אדם גם-בני-איש--    יחד עשיר ואביון
word.hebrewmodern: פי ידבר חכמות והגות לבי תבונות׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς ἡμῶν καὶ οὐ παρασιωπήσεται πῦρ ἐναντίον αὐτοῦ καυθήσεται καὶ κύκλῳ αὐτοῦ καταιγὶς σφόδρα

word.kjv: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระองค์มีพระประสงค์ความจริงภายใน และจะทรงสอนสติปัญญาแก่ข้าพระองค์ภายในจิตใจลึกลับของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: He aquí, tú amas la verdad en lo íntimo: Y en lo secreto me has hecho comprender sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Dilexisti omnia verba præcipitationis, lingua dolosa.
word.italian1927: Ecco, tu ami la sincerità nell’interiore; insegnami dunque sapienza nel segreto del cuore.
word.german1912: Siehe, du hast Lust zur Wahrheit, die im Verborgenen liegt; du lässest mich wissen die heimliche Weisheit.
word.french1910: Mais tu veux que la vérité soit au fond du coeur: Fais donc pénétrer la sagesse au dedans de moi!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 看哪！你喜愛的是內心的誠實；在我內心的隱密處，你使我得智慧。
word.korean: 중심에 진실함을 주께서 원하시오니 내 속에 지혜를 알게 하시리이다
word.tagalog: Narito, ikaw ay nagnanasa ng katotohanan sa mga loob na sangkap; at sa kubling bahagi ay iyong ipakikilala sa akin ang karunungan.
word.maori: Na ko tau e matenui ai ko te pono i nga wahi o roto, a ka whakaakona oku wahi ngaro e koe ki te whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, ikaw nagatinguha ug kamatuoran sa mga sulod nga bahin; Ug sa bahin nga natago pagapasabton mo ako sa kinaadman.
word.hebrew: ו  לך לבדך חטאתי    והרע בעיניך עשיתי למען תצדק בדברך--    תזכה בשפטך
word.hebrewmodern: הן אמת חפצת בטחות ובסתם חכמה תודיעני׃
word.greekot: ἠγάπησας πάντα τὰ ῥήματα καταποντισμοῦ γλῶσσαν δολίαν

word.kjv: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.
word.thailand: ขอพระองค์ทรงสอนให้นับวันของข้าพระองค์ เพื่อข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจะตั้งจิตตั้งใจได้สติปัญญา
word.spanish1909: Enséñanos de tal modo á contar nuestros días, Que traigamos al corazón sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: In manibus portabunt te, ne forte offendas ad lapidem pedem tuum.
word.italian1927: Insegnaci dunque a così contare nostri giorni, che acquistiamo un cuor savio.
word.german1912: Lehre uns bedenken, daß wir sterben müssen, auf daß wir klug werden.
word.french1910: Enseigne-nous à bien compter nos jours, Afin que nous appliquions notre coeur à la sagesse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你教導我們怎樣數算自己的日子，好使我們得著智慧的心。
word.korean: 우리에게 우리 날 계수함을 가르치사 지혜의 마음을 얻게 하소서
word.tagalog: Kaya ituro mo sa amin ang pagbilang ng aming mga kaarawan, upang kami ay mangagtamo sa amin ng pusong may karunungan.
word.maori: ¶ Akona matou ki te tatau i o matou ra, kia anga ai te ngakau ki te whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Busa tudloi kami sa pag-isip sa among mga adlaw, Aron makabaton kami ug usa ka kasingkasing nga manggialamon.
word.hebrew: יב  למנות ימינו כן הודע    ונבא לבב חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: למנות ימינו כן הודע ונבא לבב חכמה׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ χειρῶν ἀροῦσίν σε μήποτε προσκόψῃς πρὸς λίθον τὸν πόδα σου

word.kjv: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ พระราชกิจของพระองค์มากมายจริงๆ พระองค์ทรงสร้างการงานนั้นทั้งสิ้นด้วยพระปัญญา แผ่นดินโลกเต็มไปด้วยทรัพย์สมบัติของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Cuán muchas son tus obras, oh Jehová! Hiciste todas ellas con sabiduría: La tierra está llena de tus beneficios.
word.latinvulgate: Et auxit populum suum vehementer, et firmavit eum super inimicos ejus.
word.italian1927: Quanto son numerose le tue opere, o Eterno! Tu le hai fatte tutte con sapienza; la terra è piena delle tue ricchezze.
word.german1912: HERR, wie sind deine Werke so groß und viel! Du hast sie alle weislich geordnet, und die Erde ist voll deiner Güter.
word.french1910: Que tes oeuvres sont en grand nombre, ô Eternel! Tu les as toutes faites avec sagesse. La terre est remplie de tes biens.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你所造的真是眾多。它們都是你用智慧造成的；全地充滿你所造的東西。
word.korean: 저기 크고 넓은 바다가 있고 그 속에 동물 곧 대소 생물이 무수하니이다
word.tagalog: Oh Panginoon, pagka sarisari ng iyong mga gawa! sa karunungan ay ginawa mo silang lahat: ang lupa ay puno ng iyong kayamanan.
word.maori: Ano te tini o au mahi, e Ihowa! he mohio rawa tau mahi i aua mea katoa; ki tonu te whenua i au taonga.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, pagkadaghan sa imong mga buhat! Sa kaalam gibuhat mo silang tanan: Ang yuta napuno sa imong mga bahandi.
word.hebrew: כד  מה-רבו מעשיך יהוה--    כלם בחכמה עשית מלאה הארץ    קנינך
word.hebrewmodern: מה רבו מעשיך יהוה כלם בחכמה עשית מלאה הארץ קנינך׃
word.greekot: καὶ ηὔξησεν τὸν λαὸν αὐτοῦ σφόδρα καὶ ἐκραταίωσεν αὐτὸν ὑπὲρ τοὺς ἐχθροὺς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.
word.thailand: ให้ผูกมัดเจ้านายของพระองค์ตามชอบใจ และสอนสติปัญญาแก่ผู้อาวุโสของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Para que reprimiera á sus grandes como él quisiese, Y á sus ancianos enseñara sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: mirabilia in terra Cham, terribilia in mari Rubro.
word.italian1927: per incatenare i principi a suo talento, e insegnare ai suoi anziani la sapienza.
word.german1912: daß er seine Fürsten unterwiese nach seiner Weise und seine Ältesten Weisheit lehrte.
word.french1910: Afin qu'il pût à son gré enchaîner ses princes, Et qu'il enseignât la sagesse à ses anciens.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使他可以隨意捆綁王的群臣，把智慧教導王的長老。
word.korean: 임의로 백관을 제어하며 지혜로 장로들을 교훈하게 하였도다
word.tagalog: Upang talian ang kaniyang mga pangulo sa kaniyang kaligayahan, at turuan ang kaniyang mga kasangguni ng karunungan.
word.maori: Hei herehere i ana rangatira ua pai ia, hei ako i ana kaumatua ki te whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Aron sa paggapus sa iyang mga principe sumala sa iyang kabubut-on, Ug sa pagtudlo sa iyang mga tigulang ug kaalam.
word.hebrew: כב  לאסר שריו בנפשו    וזקניו יחכם
word.hebrewmodern: לאסר שריו בנפשו וזקניו יחכם׃
word.greekot: θαυμαστὰ ἐν γῇ χαμ φοβερὰ ἐπὶ θαλάσσης ἐρυθρᾶς

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่เริ่มต้นของสติปัญญา บรรดาผู้ที่ปฏิบัติตามพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ก็ได้ความเข้าใจดี การสรรเสริญพระเจ้าดำรงอยู่เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: El principio de la sabiduría es el temor de Jehová: Buen entendimiento tienen cuantos ponen aquéllos por obra: Su loor permanece para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Peccator videbit, et irascetur, dentibus suis fremet et tabescet ; desiderium peccatorum peribit.
word.italian1927: Il timor dell’Eterno è il principio della sapienza; buon senno hanno tutti quelli che mettono in pratica la sua legge. La sua lode dimora in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Die Furcht des HERRN ist der Weisheit Anfang. Das ist eine feine Klugheit, wer darnach tut, des Lob bleibt ewiglich.
word.french1910: La crainte de l'Eternel est le commencement de la sagesse; Tous ceux qui l'observent ont une raison saine. Sa gloire subsiste à jamais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端；凡是這樣行的都是明智的。耶和華該受讚美，直到永遠。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외함이 곧 지혜의 근본이라 그 계명을 지키는 자는 다 좋은 지각이 있나니 여호와를 찬송함이 영원히 있으리로다
word.tagalog: Ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng karunungan; may mabuting pagkaunawa ang lahat na nagsisisunod ng kaniyang mga utos. Ang kaniyang kapurihan ay nananatili magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ko te timatanga o te whakaaro nui he wehi ki a Ihowa: he ngarahu nui to te hunga katoa nana era mahi; mau te whakamoemiti ki a ia, ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova mao ang sinugdanan sa kaalam; Ang tanan nga nanagtuman sa iyang mga sugo adunay maayong salabutan: Ang iyang pagdayeg nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: י  ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה--    שכל טוב לכל-עשיהם תהלתו    עמדת לעד
word.hebrewmodern: ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה שכל טוב לכל עשיהם תהלתו עמדת לעד׃
word.greekot: ἁμαρτωλὸς ὄψεται καὶ ὀργισθήσεται τοὺς ὀδόντας αὐτοῦ βρύξει καὶ τακήσεται ἐπιθυμία ἁμαρτωλῶν ἀπολεῖται

word.kjv: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ถวายแด่พระองค์ ผู้ทรงสร้างฟ้าสวรรค์ด้วยพระสติปัญญา เพราะความเมตตาของพระองค์ดำรงเป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Al que hizo los cielos con entendimiento, Porque para siempre es su misericordia.
word.latinvulgate: Si oblitus fuero tui, Jerusalem, oblivioni detur dextera mea.
word.italian1927: Colui che ha fatto con intendimento i cieli, perché la sua benignità dura in eterno.
word.german1912: der die Himmel weislich gemacht hat, denn seine Güte währet ewiglich;
word.french1910: Celui qui a fait les cieux avec intelligence, Car sa miséricorde dure à toujours!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要稱謝那用智慧造成諸天的，因為他的慈愛永遠長存。
word.korean: 지혜로 하늘을 지으신 이에게 감사하라 ! 그 인자하심이 영원함이 로다
word.tagalog: Sa kaniya na gumawa ng mga langit sa pamamagitan ng unawa: sapagka't ang kaniyang kagandahang-loob ay magpakailan man.
word.maori: I tohunga rawa nei ki te hanga i nga rangi: he mau tonu hoki tana mahi tohu.
word.cebuano: Kaniya nga tungod sa salabutan gihimo ang kalangitan; Kay ang iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot nagapadayon sa walay katapusan:
word.hebrew: ה  לעשה השמים בתבונה    כי לעולם חסדו
word.hebrewmodern: לעשה השמים בתבונה כי לעולם חסדו׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν ἐπιλάθωμαί σου ιερουσαλημ ἐπιλησθείη ἡ δεξιά μου

word.kjv: To know wisdom and instruction; to perceive the words of understanding;
word.thailand: เพื่อให้บรรลุปัญญาและคำสั่งสอน เพื่อให้เข้าใจถ้อยคำแห่งความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Para entender sabiduría y doctrina; Para conocer las razones prudentes;
word.latinvulgate: ad sciendam sapientiam et disciplinam ;
word.italian1927: perché l’uomo conosca la sapienza e l’istruzione, e intenda i detti sensati;
word.german1912: zu lernen Weisheit und Zucht, Verstand
word.french1910: Pour connaître la sagesse et l'instruction, Pour comprendre les paroles de l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要使人曉得智慧和教訓，了解充滿哲理的言語；
word.korean: 이는 지혜와 훈계를 알게 하며 명철의 말씀을 깨닫게 하며
word.tagalog: Upang umalam ng karunungan at turo; upang bulayin ang mga salita ng pagkaunawa;
word.maori: E mohiotia ai te whakaaro nui, te ako; e kitea ai nga kupu o te matauranga;
word.cebuano: Sa paghibalo sa kaalam ug pahamangno; Sa pag-ila sa mga pulong salabutan;
word.hebrew: ב  לדעת חכמה ומוסר    להבין אמרי בינה
word.hebrewmodern: לדעת חכמה ומוסר להבין אמרי בינה׃
word.greekot: γνῶναι σοφίαν καὶ παιδείαν νοῆσαί τε λόγους φρονήσεως

word.kjv: To receive the instruction of wisdom, justice, and judgment, and equity;
word.thailand: เพื่อให้รับคำสั่งสอนในเรื่องสติปัญญา ในเรื่องความเที่ยงธรรม ความยุติธรรมและความเที่ยงตรง
word.spanish1909: Para recibir el consejo de prudencia, Justicia, y juicio y equidad;
word.latinvulgate: ad intelligenda verba prudentiæ, et suscipiendam erudtionem doctrinæ, justitiam, et judicium, et æquitatem :
word.italian1927: perché riceva istruzione circa l’assennatezza, la giustizia, l’equità, la dirittura;
word.german1912: Klugheit, Gerechtigkeit, Recht und Schlecht;
word.french1910: Pour recevoir des leçons de bon sens, De justice, d'équité et de droiture;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使人領受明慧的教訓，就是公義、公正和正直；
word.korean: 지혜롭게, 의롭게, 공평하게, 정직하게, 행할 일에 대하여 훈계를 받게 하며
word.tagalog: Upang tumanggap ng turo sa pantas na paguugali, sa katuwiran, at kahatulan, at karampatan;
word.maori: E riro mai ai te ako a te ngakau mahara, te tika, te whakawa, te mea ano e rite ana;
word.cebuano: Sa pagdawat sa pahamangno sa maalamon nga pagbuhat, Sa pagkamatarung ug sa justicia ug sa pagkatul-id;
word.hebrew: ג  לקחת מוסר השכל    צדק ומשפט ומשרים
word.hebrewmodern: לקחת מוסר השכל צדק ומשפט ומישרים׃
word.greekot: δέξασθαί τε στροφὰς λόγων νοῆσαί τε δικαιοσύνην ἀληθῆ καὶ κρίμα κατευθύνειν

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นบ่อเกิดของความรู้ คนโง่ย่อมดูหมิ่นปัญญาและคำสั่งสอน
word.spanish1909: El principio de la sabiduría es el temor de Jehová: Los insensatos desprecian la sabiduría y la enseñanza.
word.latinvulgate: Timor Domini principium sapientiæ ; sapientiam atque doctrinam stulti despiciunt.
word.italian1927: Il timore dell’Eterno è il principio della scienza; gli stolti disprezzano la sapienza e l’istruzione.
word.german1912: Des HERRN Furcht ist Anfang der Erkenntnis. Die Ruchlosen verachten Weisheit und Zucht.
word.french1910: La crainte de l'Eternel est le commencement de la science; Les insensés méprisent la sagesse et l'instruction.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不受惡人的引誘敬畏耶和華是知識的開端，但愚妄人藐視智慧和教訓。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외하는 것이 지식의 근본이어늘 미련한 자는 지혜와 훈계를 멸시하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang takot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng kaalaman: nguni't ang mangmang ay humahamak sa karunungan at turo.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te wehi ki a Ihowa te timatanga o te matauranga; e whakahawea ana te whakaarokore ki te whakaaro nui, ki te ako.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova maoy sinugdan sa kahibalo; Apan ang mga buangbuang nagatamay sa kaalam ug pahamangno.
word.hebrew: ז  יראת יהוה ראשית דעת    חכמה ומוסר אוילים בזו
word.hebrewmodern: יראת יהוה ראשית דעת חכמה ומוסר אוילים בזו׃
word.greekot: ἀρχὴ σοφίας φόβος θεοῦ σύνεσις δὲ ἀγαθὴ πᾶσι τοῖς ποιοῦσιν αὐτήν εὐσέβεια δὲ εἰς θεὸν ἀρχὴ αἰσθήσεως σοφίαν δὲ καὶ παιδείαν ἀσεβεῖς ἐξουθενήσουσιν

word.kjv: So that thou incline thine ear unto wisdom, and apply thine heart to understanding;
word.thailand: กระทำหูของเจ้าให้ผึ่งเพื่อรับปัญญา และเอียงใจของเจ้าเข้าหาความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Haciendo estar atento tu oído á la sabiduría; Si inclinares tu corazón á la prudencia;
word.latinvulgate: ut audiat sapientiam auris tua, inclina cor tuum ad cognoscendam prudentiam.
word.italian1927: prestando orecchio alla sapienza e inclinando il cuore all’intelligenza;
word.german1912: daß dein Ohr auf Weisheit achthat und du dein Herz mit Fleiß dazu neigest;
word.french1910: Si tu rends ton oreille attentive à la sagesse, Et si tu inclines ton coeur à l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 留心聽智慧，致力求聰明；
word.korean: 네 귀를 지혜에 기울이며 네 마음을 명철에 두며
word.tagalog: Na anopa't iyong ikikiling ang iyong pakinig sa karunungan, at ihihilig mo ang iyong puso sa pagunawa;
word.maori: A ka tahuri tou taringa ki te whakaaro nui, ka anga ano tou ngakau ki te matauranga;
word.cebuano: Aron nga ikiling mo ang imong igdulungog ngadto sa kaalam, Ug bansayon mo ang imong kasingkasing sa pagsabut;
word.hebrew: ב  להקשיב לחכמה אזנך    תטה לבך לתבונה
word.hebrewmodern: להקשיב לחכמה אזנך תטה לבך לתבונה׃
word.greekot: ὑπακούσεται σοφίας τὸ οὖς σου καὶ παραβαλεῖς καρδίαν σου εἰς σύνεσιν παραβαλεῖς δὲ αὐτὴν ἐπὶ νουθέτησιν τῷ υἱῷ σου

word.kjv: For the LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงประทานปัญญา ความรู้และความเข้าใจมาจากพระโอษฐ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque Jehová da la sabiduría, Y de su boca viene el conocimiento y la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: quia Dominus dat sapientiam, et ex ore ejus prudentia et scientia.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno dà la sapienza; dalla sua bocca procedono la scienza e l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR gibt Weisheit, und aus seinem Munde kommt Erkenntnis und Verstand.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel donne la sagesse; De sa bouche sortent la connaissance et l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華賜人智慧，知識和聰明都出自他的口。
word.korean: 대저 여호와는 지혜를 주시며 지식과 명철을 그 입에서 내심이며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang Panginoon ay nagbibigay ng karunungan, sa kaniyang bibig nanggagaling ang kaalaman at kaunawaan:
word.maori: Ma Ihowa hoki e homai te whakaaro nui; no tona mangai te matauranga me te ngakau mohio.
word.cebuano: Kay si Jehova mohatag ug kaalam; Gikan sa iyang baba magagula ang kahibalo ug pagpakasabut:
word.hebrew: ו  כי-יהוה יתן חכמה    מפיו דעת ותבונה
word.hebrewmodern: כי יהוה יתן חכמה מפיו דעת ותבונה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι κύριος δίδωσιν σοφίαν καὶ ἀπὸ προσώπου αὐτοῦ γνῶσις καὶ σύνεσις

word.kjv: He layeth up sound wisdom for the righteous: he is a buckler to them that walk uprightly.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงสะสมสติปัญญาไว้ให้คนชอบธรรม พระองค์ทรงเป็นดั้งให้แก่ผู้ที่ดำเนินในความเที่ยงธรรม
word.spanish1909: El provee de sólida sabiduría á los rectos: Es escudo á los que caminan rectamente.
word.latinvulgate: Custodiet rectorum salutem, et proteget gradientes simpliciter,
word.italian1927: Egli tiene in serbo per gli uomini retti un aiuto potente, uno scudo per quelli che camminano integramente,
word.german1912: Er läßt's den Aufrichtigen gelingen und beschirmt die Frommen
word.french1910: Il tient en réserve le salut pour les hommes droits, Un bouclier pour ceux qui marchent dans l'intégrité,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他為正直人珍藏大智慧，給行為完全的人作盾牌；
word.korean: 그는 정직한 자를 위하여 완전한 지혜를 예비하시며 행실이 온전한 자에게 방패가 되시나니
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinapagtataglay ang matuwid ng magaling na karunungan, siya'y kalasag sa nagsisilakad sa pagtatapat;
word.maori: E rongoatia ana e ia te whakaaro nui ma te hunga tika; he whakangungu rakau ia mo te hunga he tapatahi nei te haere;
word.cebuano: Siya magatigum ug halalum nga kaalam alang sa matul-id; Siya mao ang taming kanila nga nagalakat sa pagkahingpit sa kasingkasing;
word.hebrew: ז  וצפן (יצפן) לישרים תושיה    מגן להלכי תם
word.hebrewmodern: וצפן לישרים תושיה מגן להלכי תם׃
word.greekot: καὶ θησαυρίζει τοῖς κατορθοῦσι σωτηρίαν ὑπερασπιεῖ τὴν πορείαν αὐτῶν

word.kjv: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul;
word.thailand: เมื่อปัญญาจะเข้ามาในใจของเจ้า และความรู้จะเป็นที่ร่มรื่นแก่จิตใจของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Cuando la sabiduría entrare en tu corazón, Y la ciencia fuere dulce á tu alma,
word.latinvulgate: Si intraverit sapientia cor tuum, et scientia animæ tuæ placuerit,
word.italian1927: Perché la sapienza t’entrerà nel cuore, e la scienza sarà gradevole all’anima tua;
word.german1912: Denn Weisheit wird in dein Herz eingehen, daß du gerne lernst;
word.french1910: Car la sagesse viendra dans ton coeur, Et la connaissance fera les délices de ton âme;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧使人行走義路智慧必進入你的心，知識必使你歡悅。
word.korean: 곧 지혜가 네 마음에 들어가며 지식이 네 영혼에 즐겁게 될 것이요
word.tagalog: Sapagka't karunungan ay papasok sa iyong puso, at kaalaman ay magiging ligaya sa iyong kaluluwa;
word.maori: ¶ Ka uru hoki te whakaaro nui ki roto ki tou ngakau, a ka reka te matauranga ki tou wairua;
word.cebuano: Kay ang kaalam mosulod ngadto sa imong kasingkasing, Ug ang kahibalo makapahimuot sa imong kalag;
word.hebrew: י  כי-תבוא חכמה בלבך    ודעת לנפשך ינעם
word.hebrewmodern: כי תבוא חכמה בלבך ודעת לנפשך ינעם׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν γὰρ ἔλθῃ ἡ σοφία εἰς σὴν διάνοιαν ἡ δὲ αἴσθησις τῇ σῇ ψυχῇ καλὴ εἶναι δόξῃ

word.kjv: Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding.
word.thailand: มนุษย์ผู้ประสบปัญญาและผู้ได้ความเข้าใจ เป็นสุขจริงหนอ
word.spanish1909: Bienaventurado el hombre que halla la sabiduría, Y que obtiene la inteligencia:
word.latinvulgate: Beatus homo qui invenit sapientiam, et qui affluit prudentia.
word.italian1927: Beato l’uomo che ha trovato la sapienza, e l’uomo che ottiene l’intelligenza!
word.german1912: Wohl dem Menschen, der Weisheit findet, und dem Menschen, der Verstand bekommt!
word.french1910: Heureux l'homme qui a trouvé la sagesse, Et l'homme qui possède l'intelligence!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 得智慧遠勝得金銀得著智慧，獲致聰明的人，是有福的。
word.korean: 지혜를 얻은 자와 명철을 얻은 자는 복이 있나니
word.tagalog: Mapalad ang tao na nakakasumpong ng karunungan, at ang tao na nagtatamo ng kaunawaan.
word.maori: ¶ Ka hari te tangata kua kitea nei e ia te whakaaro nui, me te tangata ano kua whiwhi ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Malipayon ang tawo nga makakaplag sa kaalam, Ug ang tawo nga makakab-ut sa pagsabut.
word.hebrew: יג  אשרי אדם מצא חכמה    ואדם יפיק תבונה
word.hebrewmodern: אשרי אדם מצא חכמה ואדם יפיק תבונה׃
word.greekot: μακάριος ἄνθρωπος ὃς εὗρεν σοφίαν καὶ θνητὸς ὃς εἶδεν φρόνησιν

word.kjv: The LORD by wisdom hath founded the earth; by understanding hath he established the heavens.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงวางรากแผ่นดินโลกโดยปัญญา พระองค์ทรงสถาปนาฟ้าสวรรค์โดยความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Jehová con sabiduría fundó la tierra; Afirmó los cielos con inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Dominus sapientia fundavit terram, stabilivit cælos prudentia.
word.italian1927: Con la sapienza l’Eterno fondò la terra, e con l’intelligenza rese stabili i cieli.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR hat die Erde durch Weisheit gegründet und durch seinen Rat die Himmel bereitet.
word.french1910: C'est par la sagesse que l'Eternel a fondé la terre, C'est par l'intelligence qu'il a affermi les cieux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華以智慧奠定大地，以聰明堅立高天。
word.korean: 여호와께서는 지혜로 땅을 세우셨으며 명철로 하늘을 굳게 펴셨고
word.tagalog: Nilikha ng Panginoon ang lupa sa pamamagitan ng karunungan; itinatag niya ang langit sa pamamagitan ng kaunawaan.
word.maori: Na te whakaaro nui o Ihowa i whakaturia ai e ia te whenua; na tona mohio tana whakapumautanga i nga rangi.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova pinaagi sa kaalam mitukod sa yuta; Pinaagi sa pagsabut iyang gitukod ang kalangitan.
word.hebrew: יט  יהוה--בחכמה יסד-ארץ    כונן שמים בתבונה
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה בחכמה יסד ארץ כונן שמים בתבונה׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς τῇ σοφίᾳ ἐθεμελίωσεν τὴν γῆν ἡτοίμασεν δὲ οὐρανοὺς ἐν φρονήσει

word.kjv: My son, let not them depart from thine eyes: keep sound wisdom and discretion:
word.thailand: บุตรชายของเราเอ๋ย จงรักษาสติปัญญาและความเฉลียวฉลาดไว้ อย่าให้ทั้งสองนี้หนีไปจากสายตาของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Hijo mío, no se aparten estas cosas de tus ojos; Guarda la ley y el consejo;
word.latinvulgate: Fili mi, ne effluant hæc ab oculis tuis. Custodi legem atque consilium,
word.italian1927: Figliuol mio, queste cose non si dipartano mai dagli occhi tuoi! Ritieni la saviezza e la riflessione!
word.german1912: Mein Kind, laß sie nicht von deinen Augen weichen, so wirst du glückselig und klug werden.
word.french1910: Mon fils, que ces enseignements ne s'éloignent pas de tes yeux, Garde la sagesse et la réflexion:
word.chinesencvtraditional: 謹守智慧必得尊榮我兒，要謹守大智慧和明辨的態度，不可讓它們離開你的眼目。
word.korean: 내 아들아 완전한 지혜와 근신을 지키고 이것들로 네 눈 앞에서 떠나지 않게 하라
word.tagalog: Anak ko, huwag silang mangahiwalay sa iyong mga mata; ingatan mo ang magaling na karunungan at ang kabaitan;
word.maori: ¶ E taku tama, kei kotiti ke ena i ou kanohi: puritia te whakaaro nui me te ngarahu pai.
word.cebuano: Anak ko, ayaw sila pagpabulaga gikan sa imong mga mata; Batoni ang halalum nga kaalam ug ang pagkabuotan:
word.hebrew: כא  בני אל-ילזו מעיניך    נצר תשיה ומזמה
word.hebrewmodern: בני אל ילזו מעיניך נצר תשיה ומזמה׃
word.greekot: υἱέ μὴ παραρρυῇς τήρησον δὲ ἐμὴν βουλὴν καὶ ἔννοιαν

word.kjv: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.
word.thailand: อย่าลืมและอย่าหันกลับจากถ้อยคำแห่งปากของเรา จงเอาปัญญา และเอาความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Adquiere sabiduría, adquiere inteligencia; No te olvides ni te apartes de las razones de mi boca;
word.latinvulgate: Posside sapientiam, posside prudentiam. Ne obliviscaris, neque declines a verbis oris mei.
word.italian1927: Acquista sapienza, acquista intelligenza; non dimenticare le parole della mia bocca, e non te ne sviare;
word.german1912: Nimm an Weisheit, nimm an Verstand; vergiß nicht und weiche nicht von der Rede meines Mundes.
word.french1910: Acquiers la sagesse, acquiers l'intelligence; N'oublie pas les paroles de ma bouche, et ne t'en détourne pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要求取智慧和哲理，不可忘記，也不可偏離我口中的話。
word.korean: 지혜를 얻으며 명철을 얻으라 내 입의 말을 잊지 말며 어기지 말라
word.tagalog: Magtamo ka ng karunungan, magtamo ka ng kaunawaan; huwag mong kalimutan, ni humiwalay man sa mga salita ng aking bibig:
word.maori: Whaia mou te whakaaro nui, whaia mou te matauranga; kaua e wareware ki tera, kaua hoki e neke atu i nga kupu a toku mangai.
word.cebuano: Batoni ang kaalam, batoni ang pagsabut; Ayaw hikalimti, ni pag-ayran mo ang mga pulong nga gikan sa akong baba;
word.hebrew: ה  קנה חכמה קנה בינה    אל-תשכח ואל-תט מאמרי-פי
word.hebrewmodern: קנה חכמה קנה בינה אל תשכח ואל תט מאמרי פי׃
word.greekot: φύλασσε ἐντολάς μὴ ἐπιλάθῃ μηδὲ παρίδῃς ῥῆσιν ἐμοῦ στόματος

word.kjv: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.
word.thailand: ปัญญาเป็นสิ่งสำคัญที่สุด ฉะนั้นจงเอาปัญญา แม้เจ้าจะได้อะไรก็ตาม จงเอาความเข้าใจไว้
word.spanish1909: Sabiduría ante todo: adquiere sabiduría: Y ante toda tu posesión adquiere inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Principium sapientiæ, posside sapientiam ; et in omni possessione tua acquire prudentiam.
word.italian1927: Il principio della sapienza è: Acquista la sapienza. Sì, a costo di quanto possiedi, acquista l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Denn der Weisheit Anfang ist, wenn man sie gerne hört und die Klugheit lieber hat als alle Güter.
word.french1910: Voici le commencement de la sagesse: Acquiers la sagesse, Et avec tout ce que tu possèdes acquiers l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧的開端（“智慧的開端”或譯：“智慧是首要的”）是求取智慧，要用你所得的一切換取哲理。
word.korean: 지혜가 제일이니 지혜를 얻으라 ! 무릇 너의 얻은 것을 가져 명철을 얻을지니라
word.tagalog: Karunungan ay pinaka pangulong bagay; kaya't kunin mo ang karunungan: Oo, sa lahat mong kukunin ay kunin mo ang unawa.
word.maori: Ko te whakaaro nui te tino mea; no reira whaia mau te whakaaro nui; a i ou whiwhinga katoa, kia whiwhi koe ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ang kaalam maoy labaw nga butang; busa batoni ang kaalam; Oo, uban sa tanan mo nga pagatinguhaon batoni ang pagsabut.
word.hebrew: ז  ראשית חכמה קנה חכמה    ובכל-קנינך קנה בינה
word.hebrewmodern: ראשית חכמה קנה חכמה ובכל קנינך קנה בינה׃
word.greekot: περιχαράκωσον αὐτήν καὶ ὑψώσει σε τίμησον αὐτήν ἵνα σε περιλάβῃ

word.kjv: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.
word.thailand: เราได้สอนเจ้าในเรื่องทางปัญญาแล้ว เราได้นำเจ้าในวิถีของความเที่ยงธรรม
word.spanish1909: Por el camino de la sabiduría te he encaminado, Y por veredas derechas te he hecho andar.
word.latinvulgate: Viam sapientiæ monstrabo tibi ; ducam te per semitas æquitatis ;
word.italian1927: Io ti mostro la via della sapienza, t’avvio per i sentieri della rettitudine.
word.german1912: Ich will dich den Weg der Weisheit führen; ich will dich auf rechter Bahn leiten,
word.french1910: Je te montre la voie de la sagesse, Je te conduis dans les sentiers de la droiture.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我指教你走智慧的道，引導你行正直的路。
word.korean: 내가 지혜로운 길로 네게 가르쳤으며 정직한 첩경으로 너를 인도하였은즉
word.tagalog: Aking itinuro ka sa daan ng karunungan; aking pinatnubayan ka sa landas ng katuwiran.
word.maori: He mea whakaako koe naku ki te ara o te whakaaro nui; he mea arahi koe naku i nga ara o te tika.
word.cebuano: Ako nagtudlo kanimo sa dalan sa kaalam; Ako nagmando kanimo sa mga alagianan sa katul-iran.
word.hebrew: יא  בדרך חכמה הריתיך    הדרכתיך במעגלי-ישר
word.hebrewmodern: בדרך חכמה הרתיך הדרכתיך במעגלי ישר׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν γὰρ πορεύῃ οὐ συγκλεισθήσεταί σου τὰ διαβήματα ἐὰν δὲ τρέχῃς οὐ κοπιάσεις

word.kjv: My son, attend unto my wisdom, and bow thine ear to my understanding:
word.thailand: บุตรชายของเราเอ๋ย จงตั้งใจต่อปัญญาของเรา จงเอียงหูของเจ้าฟังความเข้าใจของเรา
word.spanish1909: HIJO mío, está atento á mi sabiduría, Y á mi inteligencia inclina tu oído;
word.latinvulgate: Fili mi, attende ad sapientiam meam, et prudentiæ meæ inclina aurem tuam :
word.italian1927: Figliuol mio, sta’ attento alla mia sapienza, inclina l’orecchio alla mia intelligenza,
word.german1912: Mein Kind, merke auf meine Weisheit; neige dein Ohr zu meiner Lehre,
word.french1910: Mon fils, sois attentif à ma sagesse, Prête l'oreille à mon intelligence,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 當遠離淫婦我兒，要留心聽我的智慧，側耳聽我的哲理，
word.korean: 내 아들아 내 지혜에 주의하며 내 명철에 네 귀를 기울여서
word.tagalog: Anak ko, pakinggan mo ang aking karunungan; ikiling mo ang iyong pakinig sa aking unawa:
word.maori: ¶ E taku tama, tahuri ki oki whakaaro nui, kia anga tou taringa ki toku matauranga:
word.cebuano: Anak ko, pagmatngon sa akong kaalam; Ikiling ang imong igdulungog sa akong salabutan:
word.hebrew: א  בני לחכמתי הקשיבה    לתבונתי הט-אזנך
word.hebrewmodern: בני לחכמתי הקשיבה לתבונתי הט אזנך׃
word.greekot: υἱέ ἐμῇ σοφίᾳ πρόσεχε ἐμοῖς δὲ λόγοις παράβαλλε σὸν οὖς

word.kjv: Say unto wisdom, Thou art my sister; and call understanding thy kinswoman:
word.thailand: จงพูดกับปัญญาว่า "เธอเป็นพี่สาวของฉัน" และจงเรียกความเข้าใจว่า "ญาติผู้หญิง"
word.spanish1909: Di á la sabiduría: Tú eres mi hermana; Y á la inteligencia llama parienta:
word.latinvulgate: Dic sapientiæ : Soror mea es, et prudentiam voca amicam tuam :
word.italian1927: Di’ alla sapienza: "Tu sei mia sorella", e chiama l’intelligenza amica tua,
word.german1912: Sprich zur Weisheit: "Du bist meine Schwester", und nenne die Klugheit deine Freundin,
word.french1910: Dis à la sagesse: Tu es ma soeur! Et appelle l'intelligence ton amie,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要對智慧說：“你是我的姊妹”，要稱呼聰明為親人；
word.korean: 지혜에게 너는 내 누이라 하며 명철에게 너는 내 친족이라 하라
word.tagalog: Sabihin mo sa karunungan, Ikaw ay aking kapatid na babae; at tawagin mong iyong kamaganak na babae ang unawa:
word.maori: Ki atu ki te whakaaro nui, He tuahine koe noku; kiia hoki te matauranga ko tou whanaunga wahine:
word.cebuano: Pamulongan mo ang kaalam: Ikaw mao ang akong igsoon nga babaye; Ug tawga ang salabutan nga imong kauban nga babaye:
word.hebrew: ד  אמר לחכמה אחתי את    ומדע לבינה תקרא
word.hebrewmodern: אמר לחכמה אחתי את ומדע לבינה תקרא׃
word.greekot: εἶπον τὴν σοφίαν σὴν ἀδελφὴν εἶναι τὴν δὲ φρόνησιν γνώριμον περιποίησαι σεαυτῷ

word.kjv: Doth not wisdom cry? and understanding put forth her voice?
word.thailand: ปัญญามิได้ร้องเรียกหรือ ความเข้าใจมิได้เปล่งเสียงของเธอหรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿NO clama la sabiduría, Y da su voz la inteligencia?
word.latinvulgate: Numquid non sapientia clamitat, et prudentia dat vocem suam ?
word.italian1927: La sapienza non grida ella? e l’intelligenza non fa ella udire la sua voce?
word.german1912: Ruft nicht die Weisheit, und die Klugheit läßt sich hören?
word.french1910: La sagesse ne crie-t-elle pas? L'intelligence n'élève-t-elle pas sa voix?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 當受智慧的教訓智慧不是在呼喚，聰明不是在發聲嗎？
word.korean: 지혜가 부르지 아니하느냐 명철이 소리를 높이지 아니하느냐
word.tagalog: Hindi ba umiiyak ang karunungan, at inilalabas ng unawa ang kaniyang tinig?
word.maori: ¶ He teka ianei kei te karanga te whakaaro nui, e puaki ana ano te reo o te matauranga?
word.cebuano: Wala ba magsinggit ang kaalam, Ug ang pagsabut magapagula sa iyang tingog?
word.hebrew: א  הלא-חכמה תקרא    ותבונה תתן קולה
word.hebrewmodern: הלא חכמה תקרא ותבונה תתן קולה׃
word.greekot: σὺ τὴν σοφίαν κηρύξεις ἵνα φρόνησίς σοι ὑπακούσῃ

word.kjv: O ye simple, understand wisdom: and, ye fools, be ye of an understanding heart.
word.thailand: โอ คนเขลา จงเข้าใจสติปัญญา โอ คนโง่ จงมีใจที่เข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Entended, simples, discreción; Y vosotros, locos, entrad en cordura.
word.latinvulgate: Intelligite, parvuli, astutiam, et insipientes, animadvertite.
word.italian1927: Imparate, o semplici, l’accorgimento, e voi, stolti, diventate intelligenti di cuore!
word.german1912: Merkt, ihr Unverständigen, auf Klugheit und, ihr Toren, nehmt es zu Herzen!
word.french1910: Stupides, apprenez le discernement; Insensés, apprenez l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愚蒙人哪！你們要學習精明；愚昧人哪！你們心裡要明白事理。
word.korean: 어리석은 자들아 너희는 명철할지니라 미련한 자들아 너희는 마음이 밝을지니라 너희는 들을지어다
word.tagalog: Oh kayong mga musmos, magsiunawa kayo ng katalinuhan; at, kayong mga mangmang, makaunawa kayo sa puso.
word.maori: E nga kuware, kia matau koutou ki te ngarahu tupato; e nga wairangi, kia mohio te ngakau.
word.cebuano: Oh kamo nga mga walay-pagtagad, sabta ang pagpili-sa-maayo; Ug, kamong mga buang, pagmasinabtanon kamo sa inyong kasingkasing.
word.hebrew: ה  הבינו פתאים ערמה    וכסילים הבינו לב
word.hebrewmodern: הבינו פתאים ערמה וכסילים הבינו לב׃
word.greekot: νοήσατε ἄκακοι πανουργίαν οἱ δὲ ἀπαίδευτοι ἔνθεσθε καρδίαν

word.kjv: For wisdom is better than rubies; and all the things that may be desired are not to be compared to it.
word.thailand: เพราะปัญญาดีกว่าทับทิม และสิ่งที่เจ้าปรารถนาทั้งหมดจะเปรียบเทียบกับปัญญาไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Porque mejor es la sabiduría que las piedras preciosas; Y todas las cosas que se pueden desear, no son de comparar con ella.
word.latinvulgate: melior est enim sapientia cunctis pretiosissimis, et omne desiderabile ei non potest comparari.
word.italian1927: poiché la sapienza val più delle perle, e tutti gli oggetti preziosi non la equivalgono.
word.german1912: Denn Weisheit ist besser als Perlen; und alles, was man wünschen mag, kann ihr nicht gleichen.
word.french1910: Car la sagesse vaut mieux que les perles, Elle a plus de valeur que tous les objets de prix.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為智慧比紅寶石更好，你一切所喜愛的都不能和智慧比較。
word.korean: 대저 지혜는 진주보다 나으므로 무릇 원하는 것을 이에 비교할 수 없음이니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang karunungan ay maigi kay sa mga rubi; at lahat ng mga bagay na mananasa ay hindi maitutulad sa kaniya.
word.maori: Pai atu hoki te whakaaro nui i nga rupi; e kore hoki nga mea katoa e minaminatia nei e tau hei whakarite mona.
word.cebuano: Kay ang kaalam labi pang maayo kay sa mga rubi; Ug ang tanang mga butang nga pagatinguhaon dili ikagtanding niana.
word.hebrew: יא  כי-טובה חכמה מפנינים    וכל-חפצים לא ישוו-בה
word.hebrewmodern: כי טובה חכמה מפנינים וכל חפצים לא ישוו בה׃
word.greekot: κρείσσων γὰρ σοφία λίθων πολυτελῶν πᾶν δὲ τίμιον οὐκ ἄξιον αὐτῆς ἐστιν

word.kjv: I wisdom dwell with prudence, and find out knowledge of witty inventions.
word.thailand: เราคือปัญญา อยู่ในความหยั่งรู้ และเราพบความรู้แห่งความเฉลียวฉลาด
word.spanish1909: Yo, la sabiduría, habito con la discreción, Y hallo la ciencia de los consejos.
word.latinvulgate: Ego sapientia, habito in consilio, et eruditis intersum cogitationibus.
word.italian1927: Io, la sapienza, sto con l’accorgimento, e trovo la scienza della riflessione.
word.german1912: Ich, Weisheit, wohne bei der Klugheit und weiß guten Rat zu geben.
word.french1910: Moi, la sagesse, j'ai pour demeure le discernement, Et je possède la science de la réflexion.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 尊榮公義出於智慧我──智慧──和精明同住，我又獲得知識和謀略。
word.korean: 나 지혜는 명철로 주소를 삼으며 지식과 근신을 찾아 얻나니
word.tagalog: Akong karunungan ay tumatahan sa kabaitan, at aking nasusumpungan ang kaalaman at gunita.
word.maori: ¶ Kua meinga e ahau, e te whakaaro nui, ko te ngarahu pai hei nohoanga moku, e kitea ana e ahau te mohio me te ata whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Ako nga kaalam naghimo sa kabuotan nga maoy akong puloyanan. Ug nagapangita sa kahibalo ug sa pagpili-sa-maayo.
word.hebrew: יב  אני-חכמה שכנתי ערמה    ודעת מזמות אמצא
word.hebrewmodern: אני חכמה שכנתי ערמה ודעת מזמות אמצא׃
word.greekot: ἐγὼ ἡ σοφία κατεσκήνωσα βουλήν καὶ γνῶσιν καὶ ἔννοιαν ἐγὼ ἐπεκαλεσάμην

word.kjv: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.
word.thailand: เรามีคำหารือและสติปัญญา เรามีความเข้าใจ เรามีกำลัง
word.spanish1909: Conmigo está el consejo y el ser; Yo soy la inteligencia; mía es la fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Meum est consilium et æquitas ; mea est prudentia, mea est fortitudo.
word.italian1927: A me appartiene il consiglio e il buon successo; io sono l’intelligenza, a me appartiene la forza.
word.german1912: Mein ist beides, Rat und Tat; ich habe Verstand und Macht.
word.french1910: Le conseil et le succès m'appartiennent; Je suis l'intelligence, la force est à moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我有才智和大智慧，我有聰明，我有能力。
word.korean: 내게는 도략과 참 지식이 있으며 나는 명철이라 내게 능력이 있으므로
word.tagalog: Payo ay akin at magaling na kaalaman: ako'y kaunawaan; ako'y may kapangyarihan,
word.maori: Ko te whakaaro tika, ko te whakaaro nui, naku; ko ahau te matauranga, kei ahau te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ang pagpakitambag maoy ako, ug kahalalum sa kahibalo: Ako mao man ang pagsabut; aduna akoy kagahum.
word.hebrew: יד  לי-עצה ותושיה    אני בינה לי גבורה
word.hebrewmodern: לי עצה ותושיה אני בינה לי גבורה׃
word.greekot: ἐμὴ βουλὴ καὶ ἀσφάλεια ἐμὴ φρόνησις ἐμὴ δὲ ἰσχύς

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่เริ่มต้นของปัญญา และซึ่งรู้จักองค์บริสุทธิ์เป็นความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: El temor de Jehová es el principio de la sabiduría; Y la ciencia de los santos es inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Principium sapientiæ timor Domini, et scientia sanctorum prudentia.
word.italian1927: Il principio della sapienza è il timor dell’Eterno, e conoscere il Santo è l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Der Weisheit Anfang ist des HERRN Furcht, und den Heiligen erkennen ist Verstand.
word.french1910: Le commencement de la sagesse, c'est la crainte de l'Eternel; Et la science des saints, c'est l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端，認識至聖者就是聰明。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외하는 것이 지혜의 근본이요 거룩하신 자를 아는 것이 명철이니라
word.tagalog: Ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng karunungan: at ang pagkakilala sa Banal ay kaunawaan.
word.maori: Ko te timatanga o te whakaaro nui ko te wehi ki a Ihowa; ko te matauranga, ko te mohio ki te Mea Tapu.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova maoy sinugdan sa kaalam; Ug ang kahibalo niadtong Balaan mao ang pagsabut.
word.hebrew: י  תחלת חכמה יראת יהוה    ודעת קדשים בינה
word.hebrewmodern: תחלת חכמה יראת יהוה ודעת קדשים בינה׃
word.greekot: τὸ γὰρ γνῶναι νόμον διανοίας ἐστὶν ἀγαθῆς

word.kjv: In the lips of him that hath understanding wisdom is found: but a rod is for the back of him that is void of understanding.
word.thailand: ที่ริมฝีปากของผู้ที่มีความเข้าใจจะพบปัญญา แต่ไม้เรียวก็เหมาะสำหรับหลังของผู้ที่ขาดความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: En los labios del prudente se halla sabiduría: Y vara á las espaldas del falto de cordura.
word.latinvulgate: In labiis sapientis invenitur sapientia, et virga in dorso ejus qui indiget corde.
word.italian1927: Sulle labbra dell’uomo intelligente si trova la sapienza, ma il bastone è per il dosso di chi è privo di senno.
word.german1912: In den Lippen des Verständigen findet man Weisheit; aber auf den Rücken der Narren gehört eine Rute.
word.french1910: Sur les lèvres de l'homme intelligent se trouve la sagesse, Mais la verge est pour le dos de celui qui est dépourvu de sens.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 聰明人嘴裡有智慧，無知人背上受刑杖。
word.korean: 부자의 재물은 그의 견고한 성이요 가난한 자의 궁핍은 그의 패망이니라
word.tagalog: Nasusumpungan sa mga labi ng mabait ang karunungan: nguni't ang pamalo ay sa likod ng walang unawa.
word.maori: ¶ E kitea te whakaaro nui ki nga ngutu o te tangata matau; ko te rakau ia te mea mo te tuara o te ngakaukore.
word.cebuano: Diha sa mga ngabil niadtong adunay panimuot hikaplagan ang kaalam: Apan ang usa ka bunal alang sa likod niadtong walay pagsabut.
word.hebrew: יג  בשפתי נבון תמצא חכמה    ושבט לגו חסר-לב
word.hebrewmodern: בשפתי נבון תמצא חכמה ושבט לגו חסר לב׃
word.greekot: ὃς ἐκ χειλέων προφέρει σοφίαν ῥάβδῳ τύπτει ἄνδρα ἀκάρδιον

word.kjv: The lips of the righteous feed many: but fools die for want of wisdom.
word.thailand: ริมฝีปากของคนชอบธรรมเลี้ยงคนเป็นอันมาก แต่คนโง่ตายเพราะขาดสติปัญญา
word.spanish1909: Los labios del justo apacientan á muchos: Mas los necios por falta de entendimiento mueren.
word.latinvulgate: Labia justi erudiunt plurimos ; qui autem indocti sunt in cordis egestate morientur.
word.italian1927: Le labbra del giusto pascono molti, ma gli stolti muoiono per mancanza di senno.
word.german1912: Des Gerechten Lippen weiden viele; aber die Narren werden an ihrer Torheit sterben.
word.french1910: Les lèvres du juste dirigent beaucoup d'hommes, Et les insensés meurent par défaut de raison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人的嘴唇培育多人，愚妄人因無知死亡。
word.korean: 미련한 자는 행악으로 낙을 삼는 것 같이 명철한 자는 지혜로 낙을 삼느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga labi ng matuwid ay nagpapakain ng marami: nguni't ang mangmang ay namamatay sa kakulangan ng pagunawa.
word.maori: He tokomaha e whangaia ana e nga ngutu o te tangata tika; ka mate ia te hunga kuware, he kore no te ngakau mahara.
word.cebuano: Ang mga ngabil sa matarung magapakaon ug daghan; Apan ang buang-buang mamatay tungod sa pagkakulang ug salabutan,
word.hebrew: כא  שפתי צדיק ירעו רבים    ואוילים בחסר-לב ימותו
word.hebrewmodern: שפתי צדיק ירעו רבים ואוילים בחסר לב ימותו׃
word.greekot: χείλη δικαίων ἐπίσταται ὑψηλά οἱ δὲ ἄφρονες ἐν ἐνδείᾳ τελευτῶσιν

word.kjv: It is as sport to a fool to do mischief: but a man of understanding hath wisdom.
word.thailand: คนโง่กระทำความผิดเหมือนการเล่นสนุก แต่คนที่มีความเข้าใจกอปรด้วยปัญญา
word.spanish1909: Hacer abominación es como risa al insensato: Mas el hombre entendido sabe.
word.latinvulgate: Quasi per risum stultus operatur scelus, sapientia autem est viro prudentia.
word.italian1927: Commettere un delitto, per lo stolto, è come uno spasso; tale è la sapienza per l’uomo accorto.
word.german1912: Ein Narr treibt Mutwillen und hat dazu noch seinen Spott; aber der Mann ist weise, der aufmerkt.
word.french1910: Commettre le crime paraît un jeu à l'insensé, Mais la sagesse appartient à l'homme intelligent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愚昧人以行惡為嬉戲，聰明人卻以智慧為樂。
word.korean: 회리바람이 지나가면 악인은 없어져도 의인은 영원한 기초 같으니라
word.tagalog: Isang paglilibang sa mangmang ang paggawa ng kasamaan: at gayon ang karunungan sa taong naguunawa.
word.maori: ¶ Hei takaro ma te wairangi te mahi he; ma te tangata matau ia ko te whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Maoy usa ka lingaw-lingaw sa usa ka buang ang pagbuhat ug kadautan; Ug maingon niini ang kaalam alang sa usa ka tawo nga masinabuton,
word.hebrew: כג  כשחוק לכסיל עשות זמה    וחכמה לאיש תבונה
word.hebrewmodern: כשחוק לכסיל עשות זמה וחכמה לאיש תבונה׃
word.greekot: ἐν γέλωτι ἄφρων πράσσει κακά ἡ δὲ σοφία ἀνδρὶ τίκτει φρόνησιν

word.kjv: The mouth of the just bringeth forth wisdom: but the froward tongue shall be cut out.
word.thailand: ปากของคนชอบธรรมนำปัญญาออกมา แต่ลิ้นของคนตลบตะแลงจะถูกตัดออก
word.spanish1909: La boca del justo producirá sabiduría: Mas la lengua perversa será cortada.
word.latinvulgate: Os justi parturiet sapientiam ; lingua pravorum peribit.
word.italian1927: La bocca del giusto sgorga sapienza, ma la lingua perversa sarà soppressa.
word.german1912: Der Mund des Gerechten bringt Weisheit; aber die Zunge der Verkehrten wird ausgerottet.
word.french1910: La bouche du juste produit la sagesse, Mais la langue perverse sera retranchée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人的口結出智慧的果子，乖謬的舌頭必被割除。
word.tagalog: Ang bibig ng matuwid ay nagbibigay ng karunungan: nguni't ang magdarayang dila ay ihihiwalay.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te mangai o te tangata tika hua ana te whakaaro nui; ka tapahia ia te arero whanoke.
word.cebuano: Ang baba sa matarung magabunga ug kaalam; Apan ang dila nga masukihon pagaputlon.
word.hebrew: לא  פי-צדיק ינוב חכמה    ולשון תהפכות תכרת
word.hebrewmodern: פי צדיק ינוב חכמה ולשון תהפכות תכרת׃
word.greekot: στόμα δικαίου ἀποστάζει σοφίαν γλῶσσα δὲ ἀδίκου ἐξολεῖται

word.kjv: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.
word.thailand: เมื่อความเย่อหยิ่งมาถึง ความอับอายก็มาด้วย แต่ปัญญาอยู่กับคนใจถ่อม
word.spanish1909: Cuando viene la soberbia, viene también la deshonra: Mas con los humildes es la sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Ubi fuerit superbia, ibi erit et contumelia ; ubi autem est humilitas, ibi et sapientia.
word.italian1927: Venuta la superbia, viene anche l’ignominia; ma la sapienza è con gli umili.
word.german1912: Wo Stolz ist, da ist auch Schmach; aber Weisheit ist bei den Demütigen.
word.french1910: Quand vient l'orgueil, vient aussi l'ignominie; Mais la sagesse est avec les humbles.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 傲慢來，羞辱也來；謙卑的人卻有智慧。
word.korean: 교만이 오면 욕도 오거니와 겸손한 자에게는 지혜가 있느니라
word.tagalog: Pagka dumarating ang kapalaluan ay dumarating nga ang kahihiyan: nguni't nasa mababa ang karunungan.
word.maori: ¶ Ka tae te whakapehapeha, ka tae ano te whakama; kei te hunga whakaiti ia te whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Kong ang pagkamapahitas-on moabut, nan modangat unya ang kaulaw; Apan sa mapinaubsanon mao ang kaalam.
word.hebrew: ב  בא-זדון ויבא קלון    ואת-צנועים חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: בא זדון ויבא קלון ואת צנועים חכמה׃
word.greekot: οὗ ἐὰν εἰσέλθῃ ὕβρις ἐκεῖ καὶ ἀτιμία στόμα δὲ ταπεινῶν μελετᾷ σοφίαν

word.kjv: He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.
word.thailand: บุคคลที่ขาดสติปัญญาย่อมเหยียดเพื่อนบ้านของตน แต่คนที่มีความเข้าใจก็ยังนิ่งอยู่
word.spanish1909: El que carece de entendimiento, menosprecia á su prójimo: Mas el hombre prudente calla.
word.latinvulgate: Qui despicit amicum suum indigens corde est ; vir autem prudens tacebit.
word.italian1927: Chi sprezza il prossimo è privo di senno, ma l’uomo accorto tace.
word.german1912: Wer seinen Nächsten schändet, ist ein Narr; aber ein verständiger Mann schweigt still.
word.french1910: Celui qui méprise son prochain est dépourvu de sens, Mais l'homme qui a de l'intelligence se tait.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 藐視鄰舍的，真是無知；聰明人卻緘默不言。
word.korean: 두루 다니며 한담하는 자는 남의 비밀을 누설하나 마음이 신실한 자는 그런 것을 숨기느니라
word.tagalog: Siyang humahamak sa kaniyang kapuwa ay walang karunungan: nguni't ang taong naguunawa ay tumatahimik.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e whakahawea ana ki tona hoa he maharakore: tena ko te tangata matau, whakarongo puku ana.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagatamay sa iyang isigkatawo walay kaalam; Apan ang tawo nga may salabutan nagahilum.
word.hebrew: יב  בז-לרעהו חסר-לב    ואיש תבונות יחריש
word.hebrewmodern: בז לרעהו חסר לב ואיש תבונות יחריש׃
word.greekot: ἀνὴρ δίγλωσσος ἀποκαλύπτει βουλὰς ἐν συνεδρίῳ πιστὸς δὲ πνοῇ κρύπτει πράγματα

word.kjv: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.
word.thailand: คนจะได้คำชมเชยตามสติปัญญาของเขา แต่คนที่ความคิดตลบตะแลงจะเป็นที่ดูหมิ่น
word.spanish1909: Según su sabiduría es alabado el hombre: Mas el perverso de corazón será en menosprecio.
word.latinvulgate: Doctrina sua noscetur vir ; qui autem vanus et excors est patebit contemptui.
word.italian1927: L’uomo è lodato in proporzione del suo senno, ma chi ha il cuore pervertito sarà sprezzato.
word.german1912: Eines weisen Mannes Rat wird gelobt; aber die da tückisch sind, werden zu Schanden.
word.french1910: Un homme est estimé en raison de son intelligence, Et celui qui a le coeur pervers est l'objet du mépris.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人因著自己的明慧必得稱讚，但心中乖謬的必被藐視。
word.korean: 사람은 그 지혜대로 칭찬을 받으려니와 마음이 패려한 자는 멸시를 받으리라
word.tagalog: Pupurihin ang tao ayon sa kaniyang karunungan: nguni't ang masama sa puso ay hahamakin.
word.maori: ¶ Ka rite ki tona ngarahu te whakamoemiti mo te tangata; ko te ngakau parori ki ia ka whakahaweatia.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka tawo pagadayegon sumala sa iyang kaalam; Apan kadtong may kasingkasing nga masukihon pagatamayon.
word.hebrew: ח  לפי-שכלו יהלל-איש    ונעוה-לב יהיה לבוז
word.hebrewmodern: לפי שכלו יהלל איש ונעוה לב יהיה לבוז׃
word.greekot: στόμα συνετοῦ ἐγκωμιάζεται ὑπὸ ἀνδρός νωθροκάρδιος δὲ μυκτηρίζεται

word.kjv: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.
word.thailand: เพราะความทะนงตัวเท่านั้นการวิวาทจึงเกิดขึ้น แต่ปัญญาอยู่กับบรรดาผู้ที่รับคำแนะนำ
word.spanish1909: Ciertamente la soberbia parirá contienda: Mas con los avisados es la sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Inter superbos semper jurgia sunt ; qui autem agunt omnia cum consilio, reguntur sapientia.
word.italian1927: Dall’orgoglio non vien che contesa, ma la sapienza è con chi dà retta ai consigli.
word.german1912: Unter den Stolzen ist immer Hader; aber Weisheit ist bei denen, die sich raten lassen.
word.french1910: C'est seulement par orgueil qu'on excite des querelles, Mais la sagesse est avec ceux qui écoutent les conseils.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 傲慢只能引起爭端；接受勸告的卻有智慧。
word.korean: 교만에서는 다툼만 일어날 뿐이라 권면을 듣는 자는 지혜가 있느니라 망령되이 얻은 재물은 줄어가고 손으로 모은 것은 늘어가느니라
word.tagalog: Sa kapalaluan, ang dumarating ay pagtatalo lamang: nguni't ang karunungan ay nangasa nangaturuang maigi.
word.maori: ¶ He totohe anake i ahu mai i te whakapehapeha: he whakaaro nui ia kei te hunga i nga kupu tika.
word.cebuano: Tungod sa pagkamapahitas-on modangat lamang ang panagkabingkil; Apan sa maayong tinambagan mao ang kaalam.
word.hebrew: י  רק-בזדון יתן מצה    ואת-נועצים חכמה
word.hebrewmodern: רק בזדון יתן מצה ואת נועצים חכמה׃
word.greekot: κακὸς μεθ' ὕβρεως πράσσει κακά οἱ δὲ ἑαυτῶν ἐπιγνώμονες σοφοί

word.kjv: A scorner seeketh wisdom, and findeth it not: but knowledge is easy unto him that understandeth.
word.thailand: คนมักเยาะเย้ยแสวงปัญญาเสียเปล่า แต่ความรู้นั้นก็ง่ายแก่คนที่มีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Busca el escarnecedor la sabiduría, y no la halla: Mas la sabiduría al hombre entendido es fácil.
word.latinvulgate: Quærit derisor sapientiam, et non invenit ; doctrina prudentium facilis.
word.italian1927: Il beffardo cerca la sapienza e non la trova, ma per l’uomo intelligente la scienza è cosa facile.
word.german1912: Der Spötter sucht Weisheit, und findet sie nicht; aber dem Verständigen ist die Erkenntnis leicht.
word.french1910: Le moqueur cherche la sagesse et ne la trouve pas, Mais pour l'homme intelligent la science est chose facile.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好譏笑人的尋找智慧，卻尋不著；聰明人尋找知識，卻輕易得著。
word.korean: 거만한 자는 지혜를 구하여도 얻지 못하거니와 명철한 자는 지식 얻기가 쉬우니라
word.tagalog: Ang manglilibak ay humahanap ng karunungan at walang nasusumpungan: nguni't ang kaalaman ay madali sa kaniya na naguunawa.
word.maori: ¶ E rapu ana te tangata whakahi i te whakaaro nui, heoi kahore e kitea e ia; ki te tangata matau ia he mama noa te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka mayubiton magapangita sa kaalam ug dilimakakaplag niini; Apan ang kahibalo masayon alang kaniya nga may salabutan.
word.hebrew: ו  בקש-לץ חכמה ואין    ודעת לנבון נקל
word.hebrewmodern: בקש לץ חכמה ואין ודעת לנבון נקל׃
word.greekot: ζητήσεις σοφίαν παρὰ κακοῖς καὶ οὐχ εὑρήσεις αἴσθησις δὲ παρὰ φρονίμοις εὐχερής

word.kjv: The wisdom of the prudent is to understand his way: but the folly of fools is deceit.
word.thailand: ปัญญาของคนหยั่งรู้คือการเข้าใจทางของเขา แต่ความโง่ของคนโง่เป็นที่หลอกลวง
word.spanish1909: La ciencia del cuerdo es entender su camino: Mas la indiscreción de los necios es engaño.
word.latinvulgate: Sapientia callidi est intelligere viam suam, et imprudentia stultorum errans.
word.italian1927: La sapienza dell’uomo accorto sta nel discernere la propria strada, ma la follia degli stolti non è che inganno.
word.german1912: Das ist des Klugen Weisheit, daß er auf seinen Weg merkt; aber der Narren Torheit ist eitel Trug.
word.french1910: La sagesse de l'homme prudent, c'est l'intelligence de sa voie; La folie des insensés, c'est la tromperie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 精明人的智慧能分辨自己的道路；愚昧人的愚妄卻欺騙自己。
word.korean: 슬기로운 자의 지혜는 자기의 길을 아는 것이라도 미련한 자의 어리석음은 속이는 것이니라
word.tagalog: Ang karunungan ng mabait ay makaunawa ng kaniyang lakad: nguni't ang kamangmangan ng mga mangmang ay karayaan.
